研究发现使用抗性马铃薯淀粉对于造血干细胞移植患者来说是可行且安全的使用抗性马铃薯淀粉（RPS）来改变肠道微生物代谢。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Resistant-potato-starch-usage-found-to-be-feasible-and-safe-for-hematopoietic-stem-cell-transplantation-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Resistant-potato-starch-usage-found-to-be-feasible-and-safe-for-hematopoietic-stem-cell-transplantation-病人.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8c63b58a-9352-4a5b-9faa-9bdc495c5588 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 06:03:00 -0400 Resistant potato starch usage found to be feasible and safe for hematopoietic stem cell transplantation patients
新冠疫情隐性医疗负担：英国超过 200 万人受到影响2020 年 1 月至 2023 年期间长期冠状病毒病 (COVID) 或 LC 患者的医疗保健利用情况。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Long-Covids-hidden-healthcare-burden-Over-2-million-affected-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Long-Covids-hidden-healthcare-burden-Over-2-million-affected-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2368b174-9e55-4f2a-a349-77df73c36740 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 05:39:00 -0400 Long Covid's hidden healthcare burden: Over 2 million affected in the UK
DeNovix CellDrop 成为首个经过 ACT® 标签认证的自动细胞计数器DeNovix CellDrop™ 自动细胞计数器已获得 My Green Lab® 的 ACT® 标签认证，使其成为第一款获得该计划认可的自动细胞计数器。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/DeNovix-CellDrop-becomes-first-ACTc2ae-label-certified-automated-cell-counter.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/DeNovix-CellDrop-becomes-first-ACTc2ae-label-certified-automated-cell-counter.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=27a8fa2a-9da1-47c7-b20f-a2aa595b0fa6 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 05:20:00 -0400 DeNovix CellDrop becomes first ACT® label certified automated cell counter
肿瘤中的惰性乳杆菌：通过乳酸诱导的代谢重连驱动放化疗耐药研究影响宫颈癌患者放化疗的肿瘤和肠道微生物特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Lactobacillus-iners-in-tumors-Driving-chemorradiation-resistance-via-lactate-induced-metabolic-rewiring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231024/Lactobacillus-iners-in-tumors-Driving-chemorradiation-resistance-via-lactate-induced-metabolic-rewiring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=886678ea-dc10-4417-8c68-6c950b2a67b6 Tue, 24 Oct 2023 05:12:00 -0400 Lactobacillus iners in tumors: Driving chemoradiation resistance via lactate-induced metabolic rewiring
阿尔茨海默病患者大脑异常电活动导致癫痫发作阿尔茨海默病会导致神经元死亡，研究人员推测这可能会导致大脑异常电活动，从而导致癫痫发作。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Abnormal-electrical-activity-in-the-brain-of-people-with-Alzheimers-leads-to-epileptic-seizures.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Abnormal-electrical-activity-in-the-brain-of-people-with-Alzheimers-leads-to-epileptic-seizures.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=718cef39-98f4-4409-9a97-8be135f1e47b Mon, 23 Oct 2023 23:33:59 -0400 Abnormal electrical activity in the brain of people with Alzheimer's leads to epileptic seizures
CDC 签署决定备忘录，允许 Novavax 单价 COVID-19 加强剂用于成人今天，CDC 主任 Rochelle P. Walensky（医学博士、公共卫生硕士）签署了一份决定备忘录，允许 Novavax 单价 COVID-19 加强剂用于成人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/CDC-signs-decision-memo-allowing-Novavax-monovalent-COVID-19-boosters-for-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/CDC-signs-decision-memo-allowing-Novavax-monovalent-COVID-19-boosters-for-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4bc747eb-6d37-4a34-b650-476d34a16f06 Mon, 23 Oct 2023 23:04:14 -0400 CDC signs decision memo allowing Novavax monovalent COVID-19 boosters for adults
使用阿片类药物结算现金购买警车和扫描仪等警用设备引发争论治安开支迅速增加：在科罗拉多州举办一场关于芬太尼的执法会议需要 25,000 美元； 18,000 美元用于康涅狄格州索辛顿的手机解锁技术； 2,900 美元用于购买俄亥俄州新列克星敦的监控摄像头以及培训警员和警犬。在全国其他社区，有数十万辆汽车、人体扫描仪和其他设备。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Using-opioid-settlement-cash-for-police-gear-like-squad-cars-and-scanners-sparks-debate.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Using-opioid-settlement-cash-for-police-gear-like-squad-cars-and-scanners-sparks-debate.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3f5e083-cdcb-45bc-993e-7d70106041c8 Mon, 23 Oct 2023 22:29:26 -0400 Using opioid settlement cash for police gear like squad cars and scanners sparks debate
快速基因测试为患病、未确诊的孩子带来了希望。但很少有保险公司愿意支付。 2021 年，莱拉·巴巴耶夫 (Layla Babayev) 在西雅图地区的一家医院出生后仅 48 小时，就正在接受肠梗阻手术。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Quick-genic-test-offers-hope-for-sick-undiagnosed-kids-but-few-insurers-offer-to-pay.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Quick-genic-test-offers-hope-for-sick-undiagnosed-kids-but-few-insurers-offer-to-pay.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5c8f64b-8303-4495-ae03-bc50bfa63cfc Mon, 23 Oct 2023 22:21:18 -0400 Quick genetic test offers hope for sick, undiagnosed kids. but few insurers offer to pay.
基于人工智能的 MRI 工具在多发性硬化症诊断中显示出前景NPJ 数字医学中的一项开创性研究证明了基于人工智能的成像在诊断和监测多发性硬化症方面具有卓越的准确性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/AI-based-MRI-tools-show-promise-in-multiple-sclerosis-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/AI-based-MRI-tools-show-promise-in-multiple-sclerosis-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d2946fcd-642a-4352-ac16-5c223135dd2c Mon, 23 Oct 2023 21:01:00 -0400 AI-based MRI tools show promise in multiple sclerosis diagnosis
赋权增强复原力：耻辱对糖尿病患者生活质量的作用一项中国研究揭示了赋权如何通过减轻耻辱感来影响糖尿病患者的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Empowerment-boosts-resilience-Stigmas-role-in-diabetes-病人-quality-of-life.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231023/Empowerment-boosts-resilience-Stigmas-role-in-diabetes-病人-quality-of-life.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bff45537-a247-459a-abf5-ed14d1547e0e Mon, 23 Oct 2023 20:50:00 -0400 Empowerment boosts resilience: Stigma's role in diabetes patients' quality of life
